    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Attraction and repulsion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anziehung und Abstossung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attraction et répulsion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atração e repulsion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrazione e repulsione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έλξη και απέχθεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Atracción y repulsión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that magnets can attract or repel each other depending on which poles are brought together.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß Magneten abhängig 
von, welchen Pfosten anziehen oder sich abstoßen können 
zusammengebracht werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve que les aimants peuvent 
attirer ou se repousser selon quels poteaux sont rassemblés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que os ímãs podem atrair 
ou se repelir dependendo de que pólos são trazidos junto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che i magneti possono 
attrarre o respingersi secondo quali pali sono riuniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι οι μαγνήτες μπορούν να
προσελκύσουν ή να αποκρούουν ο ένας τον άλλον ανάλογα με τους 
οποίους οι πόλοι συγκεντρώνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que los imanes pueden 
atraer o rechazarse dependiendo se reúnen de qué postes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
